task.title: Auto Provision Phonebook
task.shortdesc: You can upload a phonebook to the PBX, and auto provision the phonebook to all the users' phones.

ul.li: After auto provisioning phonebooks to the users' phones, the existing phonebooks on their phones will disappear.
Auto provisioning phonebook only works for the phones that were registered to the PBX via auto provisioning.

step.cmd: Go to Auto Provisioning Phonebook Phonebook , click Upload Phonebook.
On the configuration page, select the phone manufacturer, and click Browse to choose an xml file.

ul.li: The file name should not contain special characters.
To make an xml file, contact your phone manufacturer; you can also log in the phone web interface, export an xml file to start with.

step.cmd: Click Upload to upload the file to PBX.
Reboot the phone(s) and update phonebook
